417:1: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattva evaṃ dharmakālasaṃcoditaḥ saṃstato mahāvimānānniṣkramya dharmoccayo nāma mahāprāsādo yatra niṣadya bodhisattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati sma,
417:3: abhiruhya ca sudharme siṃhāsane niṣīdati sma|
417:4: atha ye devaputrā bodhisattvasya sabhāgāḥ samayānasaṃprasthitāste'pi tameva prāsādamabhirohanti sma|
417:5: ye ca daśadiksaṃnipatitā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāgacaritā bodhisattvasya devaputrāśca,
417:6: te'pi taṃ prāsādamabhiruhya yathāpratyarheṣu siṃhāsaneṣu svakasvakeṣu niṣīdanti,
417:8: iti hi bhikṣavo dvādaśabhirvarṣairbodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakramiṣyatīti||
417:9: atha śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya divyaṃ varṇamantardhāpya brāhmaṇaveṣeṇa brāhmaṇān vedānadhyāpayanti sma|
417:12: yaiḥ samanvāgatasya dve gatī bhavato na tṛtīyā|
417:14: rājā bhavatī cakravartī caturaṅgo vijitavān dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ|
417:16: tadyathā-cakraratnaṃ hastiratnaṃ aśvaratnaṃ strīratnaṃ maṇiratnaṃ gṛhapatiratnaṃ pariṇāyakaratnameva saptamam||
417:17: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī cakraratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
417:18: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadheyaṃ ca pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopavāsoṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasya stryāgāraparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati|
417:19: sahasrāraṃ sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ suvarṇavarṇakarmālaṃkṛtaṃ saptatālamuccaiḥ samantād dṛṣṭvāntaḥpuraṃ rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya taddivyaṃ cakraratnameva bhavati|
417:20: śrutaṃ khalu mayā yasya kila rājñaḥ kṣatriayasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadheyaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ śiraḥsnātasyopavāsoṣitasyopariprāsādatalagatasya stryāgāraparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
417:22: nūnamahaṃ rājā cakravartī yannvahaṃ divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ mīmāṃsayeyam|
417:23: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikta ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ prārthayedevaṃ cāvedayet-pravartayasva bhaṭṭa divyaṃ cakraratnaṃ dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa|
417:24: atha taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena pravartitaṃ samyagevaṛddhau vihāyasā pūrveṇa vrajati|
417:25: anveti rājā cakravartī sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena|
417:26: yatra ca pṛthivīpradeśe taddivyaṃ cakraratnaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate,
417:27: tatra rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena|
417:28: atha ye te bhavanti pūrvasyāṃ diśi rājāno maṇḍalinaḥ,
417:29: te rūpyapātrīṃ vā suvarṇacūrṇaparipūrṇāmādāya svarṇapātrīṃ vā rūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇāmādāya rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ pratyuttiṣṭhanti-ehi deva svāgataṃ devāya,
417:30: idaṃ devasya rājyamṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca|
417:32: evamukte rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastrātā tān rājño maṇḍalina etadavocat-kārayantu bhavantaḥ svakāni rājyāni dharmeṇa|
417:39: evaṃ khalu rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ vijayati|
417:40: pūrvāṃ diśaṃ vijitaḥ pūrvaṃ samudramavagāhya pūrvaṃ samudramavatarati|
417:41: pūrvaṃ samudramavatīrya samyageva ṛddhyā vihāyasā dakṣiṇena vrajati|
417:42: anveti rājā cakravartī sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena|
417:47: pratyuttīrya samyageva ṛddhyā vihāyasā rājadhānīmāgatyopari antaḥpuradvāre'kṣatamevāsthāt|
417:48: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaścakraratnena samanvāgato bhavati||
417:49: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī hastiratnena samanvāgato bhavati ?
417:51: sarvaśvetaṃ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitaṃ svarṇacūḍakaṃ svarṇadhvajaṃ svarṇālaṃkāraṃ hemajālapraticchannaṃ ṛddhimantaṃ vihāyasā gāminaṃ vikurvaṇādharmiṇaṃ yaduta bodhirnāma nāgarājā|
417:52: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastaddhastiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati,
417:53: atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāṃ taddhastiratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthivīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantato'nvāhiṇḍya rājadhānīmāgatya praśāsanaratiḥ pratyanubhavati|
417:54: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī hastiratnena samanvāgato bhavati||
417:55: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
417:57: sarvanīlaṃ kṛṣṇaśirasaṃ muñjakeśamādṛtavadanaṃ svarṇadhvajaṃ svarṇālaṃkāraṃ hemajālapraticchannaṃ ṛddhimantaṃ vihāyasā gāminaṃ vikurvaṇādharmiṇaṃ yaduta bālāhako nāmāśvarājam|
417:58: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto'śvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati,
417:59: atha sūryasyābhyudgamanavelāyāmaśvaratnamabhiruhya imāmeva mahāpṛthvīṃ samudraparikhāṃ samudraparyantāṃ samantanto'nvāhiṇḍya rājadhānīmāgatya praśāsanaratiḥ pratyanubhavati|
417:60: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ aśvaratnena samanvāgato bhavati||
417:61: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartīṃ maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
417:62: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavanmaṇiratnamutpadyate śuddhanīlavaiḍūryamaṣṭāṃśaṃ suparikarmakṛtam|
417:63: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayā sarvamantaḥpuramavabhāsyena sphuṭaṃ bhavati|
417:64: yadā ca rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktastaṃ maṇiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmo bhavati,
417:65: atha rātryāmardharātrasamaye'ndhakāratamisrāyāṃ taṃ maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre ucchrāpayitvā udyānabhūmiṃ niryāti subhūmidarśanāya|
417:66: tasya khalu punarmaṇiratnasyābhayāsarvāvantaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyamavabhāsena sphuṭībhavati sāmantena yojanam|
417:67: ye khalu punastasya maṇiratnasya sāmantake manuṣyāḥ prativasanti,
417:70: anyonyamāhuḥ-uttiṣṭha bhadramukhāḥ karmāntāni kārayataḥ āpaṇāni prasārayata,
417:72: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto maṇiratnena samanvāgato bhavati||
417:73: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
417:75: sadṛśī kṣatriyā nātidīrghā nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurī nātikṛṣṇā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā|
417:81: sā rājānaṃ cakravartinaṃ muktvā nānyasmin manasāpi rāgaṃ karoti kiṃ punaḥ kāyena|
417:82: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī strīratnena samanvāgato bhavati||
417:83: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
417:84: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya pūrvavad gṛhapatiratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī divyacakṣuḥ|
417:85: sa tena divyacakṣuṣā sāmantena yojanaṃ sasvāmikāni nidhānāni paśyati,
417:89: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī gṛhapatiratnena samanvāgato bhavati||
417:90: kathaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati?
417:91: iha rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhāṣibhiktasya pūrvavatpariṇāyakaratnamutpadyate paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī|
417:93: evaṃrūpeṇa rājā cakravartī pariṇāyakaratnena samanvāgato bhavati|
417:95: bhavati cāsya putrasahasraṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām|
417:98: vāntachandarāgo netā ananyadevaḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti||
417:99: tathā anye'pi devaputrā jambudvīpamāgatya pratyekabuddhebhya ārocayanti sma-riñcata mārṣā buddhakṣetram|
417:101: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena rājagṛhe mahānagare golāṅgulaparivartane parvate mātaṅgo nāma pratyekabuddho viharati sma|
417:102: sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā kardama iva śilāyāṃ prasthāya vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya ca tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvāṇo'yam|
417:107: tena khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ samayena vārāṇasyāṃ ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve pañca pratyekabuddhaśatāni viharanti sma|
417:108: te'pi taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā vihāyasā saptatālamātramatyudgamya tejodhātuṃ samāpadyolkeva parinirvānti sma|
417:113: abhayadattāśca tasmin mṛgāḥ prativasanti iti tadagreṇa mṛgadāvasya mṛgadāva iti saṃjñodapādi||
417:114: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthitaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma |
417:117: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kālavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
417:118: na bodhisattva ādipravṛtte loke sattvasaṃvartanīkālasamaye mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāmati,
417:119: atha tarhi yadā vyakto lokaḥ susthito bhavati,
417:125: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo dvīpavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
417:131: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvo deśavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
417:133: yeṣu manuṣyā andhajātyā jaḍā eḍamūkajātīyā abhavyāḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāmarthaṃ jñātum|
417:135: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bodhisattvaḥ kulavilokitaṃ vilokayati sma?
417:136: na bodhisattvā hīnakuleṣūpapadyante caṇḍālakuleṣu vā veṇukārakule vā rathakārakule vā puṣkasakule vā|
417:137: atha tarhi kuladvaye evopapadyante brāhmaṇakule kṣatriyakule ca|
417:144: tamarthaṃ ca saṃpratītya bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanasthaścatvāri mahāvilokitāni vilokayati sma||
417:146: iti hi bhikṣavaste devaputrāḥ bodhisattvasyānyonyaṃ paripṛcchanti sma-katamasmin kularatne kiyadrūpāyāṃ jananyāṃ bodhisattvaḥ pratiṣṭhateti|
417:147: tatra kecidāhuḥ-idaṃ vaidehīkulaṃ magadheṣu janapadeṣu ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca|
417:150: tatkasmāt? tathā hi-tanna mātṛśuddhaṃ pitṛśuddhaṃ aplutaṃ cañcalamanavasthitaṃ parittapuṇyābhiṣyanditaṃ na vipulapuṇyābhiṣiktaṃ satkulapradeśopacāraṃ nodyānasarastaḍāgākīrṇaṃ karvaṭamiva pratyantavāsam|
417:152: apare tvāhuḥ-idaṃ punaḥ kauśalakulaṃ mahāvāhanaṃ ca mahāparivāraṃ ca mahādhanaṃ ca|
417:157: hīnādhimuktikaṃ na ca kuloditaṃ na cāparimitadhanaratnanidhisamutthitam|
417:159: apare tvāhuḥ-idaṃ vaṃśarājakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca|
417:163: tathāhi-vaṃśarājakulaṃ prākṛtaṃ ca caṇḍaṃ ca na cojjvalitatejasaṃ parapuruṣajanmāvṛtaṃ ca na mātṛpitṛsvatejaḥ karmābhinirvṛttaṃ ca|
417:166: apare'pyāhuḥ-iyaṃ vaiśālī mahānagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ramaṇīyā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca vitardiniryūhatoraṇagavākṣaharmyakūṭāgāraprāsādatalasamalaṃkṛtā ca puṣpavāṭikāvanarājisaṃkusumitā ca amarabhavanapuraprākāśyā|
417:177: apare tvevamāhuḥ- idaṃ pradyotakulaṃ mahābalaṃ ca mahāvāhanaṃ ca paracamūśirasi vijayalabdhaṃ ca|
417:181: tathā hi-te caṇḍāśca capalāśca raudrāśca paruṣāśca sāhasikāśca,
417:184: apara evamāhuḥ-iyaṃ mathurā nagarī ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca|
417:190: na yujyate caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya mithyādṛṣṭikule upapattum|
417:192: apare'pyāhuḥ-ayaṃ hastināpure mahānagare rājā pāṇḍavakulavaṃśaprasūtaḥ śūro vīryavān varāṅgarūpasaṃpannaḥ parasainyapramardakānāṃ tatkulaṃ pratirūpamasya bodhisattvasya garbhapratisaṃsthānāyeti|
417:195: tathā hi-pāṇḍavakulaprasūtaiḥ kulavaṃśo'tivyākulīkṛto yudhiṣṭhiro dharmasya putra iti kathayati,
417:200: apara āhuḥ- iyaṃ mithilā nagarī atīva ramaṇīyā maithilasya rājñaḥ sumitrasya nivāsabhūmiḥ|
417:207: evaṃ bhikṣavaste bodhisattvā devaputrāśca sarvasmin jambudvīpe ṣoḍaśajānapadeṣu yāni kāniciduccoccāni rājakulāni,
417:210: teṣāṃ cintāmanaskāraprayuktānāṃ jñānaketudhvajo nāma devaputro'vaivartiko bodhāya kṛtaniścayo'sminmahāyāne|
417:211: sa tāṃ mahatīṃ bodhisattvadevaparṣadametadavocat-etanmārṣā etameva bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya pariprakṣyāmaḥ- kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne kule caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti|
417:212: sādhviti te sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭā bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paryaprākṣuḥ-kīdṛgguṇasaṃpanne satpuruṣakularatne caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyata iti||
417:213: tato bodhisattvastaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ devagaṇaṃ ca vyavalokya etadavocat-catuṣṣaṣṭyākārairmārṣāḥ saṃpannakulaṃ bhavati yatra caramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ pratyājāyate|
417:230: amātyāvekṣitaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti|
417:231: avandhyaśilpaniveśanaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati bhogān paribhunakti|
417:234: kṛtajñaṃ ca kṛtaveditaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati|
417:275: anavadyaṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati sarvajātivādadoṣaiḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām|
417:276: ebhirmārṣāścatuṣṣaṣṭyākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ ca tatkulaṃ bhavati yasmiṃścaramaḥ bhaviko bodhisattva utpadyate||
417:277: dvātriṃśatā mārṣā guṇākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī bhavati yasyāḥ striyāścaramabhaviko bodhisattvaḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati|
417:279: yaduta abhijñātāyāṃ striyāṃ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo'vakrāmati|
417:280: abhilakṣitāyā acchidropacārāyā jātisaṃpannāyāḥ kulasaṃpannāyā rūpasaṃpannāyā nāmasaṃpannāyā ārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāyā aprasūtāyāḥ śīlasaṃpannāyāḥ tyāgasaṃpannāyāḥ smitamukhāyāḥ pradakṣiṇagrāhiṇyā vyaktāyā vinītāyā viśāradāyā bahuśrutāyāḥ paṇḍitāyā aśaṭhāyā amāyāvinyā akrodhanāyā apagaterṣyāyā amatsarāyā acañcalāyā acapalāyā amukharāyāḥ kṣāntisaurabhyasaṃpannāyā hryapatrāpyasaṃpannāyā mandarāgadveṣamohāyā apagatamātṛgrāmadoṣāyāḥ pativratāyāḥ sarvākāraguṇasaṃpannāyāḥ striyāḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo'vakrāmati|
417:281: ebhirmārṣā dvātriṃśatākāraiḥ samanvāgatā sā strī yasyāḥ striyāḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo'vakrāmati ||
417:282: na khalu punarmārṣāḥ kṛṣṇapakṣe bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣāvavakrāmati,
417:284: evaṃ pañcadaśyāṃ pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇimāyāṃ puṣyanakṣatrayoge poṣadhaparigṛhītāyā mātuḥ kukṣau caramabhaviko bodhisattvo'vakrāmati||
417:285: atha khalu te bodhisattvāste ca devaputrā bodhisattvasyāntikādimāmevarūpāṃ kulapariśuddhiṃ mātṛpariśuddhiṃ ca śrutvā cintāmanaskārā abhūvan|
417:286: katamaṃ kulaṃ evaṃguṇasamanvāgataṃ bhavedyāvadvidhamanena satpuruṣeṇa nirdiṣṭam?
417:287: teṣāṃ cintāmanaskāraprayuktānāmetadabhūt-idaṃ khalvapi śākyakulaṃ ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca|
417:288: rājā śuddhodano mātṛśuddhaḥ pitṛśuddhaḥ patnīśuddho'parikṛṣṭasaṃpannāyāḥ svākārasuvijñāpakaḥ puṇyatejastejito mahāsaṃmatakule prasūtaścakravartivaṃśakulakulodito'parimitadhananidhiratnasamanvāgataḥ karmadṛkca vigatapāpadṛṣṭikaśca|
417:289: sarvaśākyaviṣaye caikarājā pūjito mānitaḥ śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyapāriṣadyānāṃ prāsādiko darśanīyo nātivṛddho nātitaruṇo'bhirūpaḥ sarvaguṇopetaḥ śilpajñaḥ kālajña ātmajño dharmajñastattvajño lokajño lakṣaṇajño dharmarājo dharmeṇānuśāstā avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kapilavastumahānilayaḥ|
417:291: rājñaśca śuddhodanasya māyā nāma devī suprabuddhasya śākyādhipaterduhitā navataruṇī rūpayauvanasaṃpannā aprasūtā apagataputraduhitṛkā surūpā salekhyavicitreva darśanīyā devakanyeva sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā apagatamātṛgrāmadoṣā satyavādinyakarkaśā aparuṣā acapalānavadyā kokilasvarā apralāpinī madhurapriyavādinī vyapagatākhilakrodhamadamānadarpapratighā anīrṣukā kālavādinī tyāgasaṃpannā śīlavatī patisaṃtuṣṭā pativratā parapuruṣacintāmanaskārāpagatā samasaṃhataśiraḥkarṇanāsā bhramavarasadṛśakeśī sulalāṭī subhrūrvyapagatabhrukuṭikā smitamukhī pūrvābhilāpinī ślakṣṇamadhuravacanā pradakṣiṇagrāhiṇī ṛjvī akuṭilā aśaṭhā amāyāvinī hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā acapalā acañcalā amukharā avikīrṇavacanā mandarāgadveṣamohā kṣāntisaurabhyasaṃpannā karacaraṇanayanasvārakṣitabuddhiḥ mṛdutaruṇahastapādā kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśā navanalinendīvarapatrasuviśuddhanayanā raktatuṅganāsā supratiṣṭhitāṅgī sendrāyudhamiva yaṣṭiḥ suvinītā suvibhaktāṅgapratyaṅgā aninditāṅgī bimboṣṭhī cārudaśanā anupūrvagrīvā svalaṃkṛtā sumanā vārṣikī suviśuddhadarśanā suvinītāṃsā anupūrvasujātabāhuścāpodarī anupahatapārśvā gambhīranābhimaṇḍalā vṛttasuvistīrṇaślakṣṇakaṭhinakaṭirvajrasaṃhananakalpasadṛśamātrā gajabhujasamasamāhitasadṛśorū aiṇeyamṛgasadṛśajaṅghā lākṣārasasadṛśapāṇipādā jagati nayanābhiramyā apratihatacakṣurindriyā manāpapriyadarśanā strīratnarūpaprativiśiṣṭā māyānirmitamiva bimbaṃ māyānāmasaṃketā kalāvicakṣaṇā nandana ivāpsaraḥ-prakāśā śuddhodanasya mahārājasyāntaḥpuramadhyagatā|
